name: grd_me
title: Grd Me
description: Grd Me (/ɡärd mē/) is an open source browser plugin that provides encrypted communication across any web platform.
author: Winston Howes

preferences.name: decryptIndicator
preferences.title: Decrypt Indicator
preferences.description: The Grd Me lock icon will be displayed in front of any successfully decrypted text. You may need to refresh open pages to see this.

preferences.name: sandboxDecrypt
preferences.title: Sandboxed Decryption (Experimental)
preferences.description: By default, when Grd Me decrypts a message it inserts the decryption right back into the webpage. Turning this on prevents the webpage from reading your decrypted text. This is experimental solely due to performance reasons.

preferences.name: eccCurve
preferences.title: ECC Curve
preferences.description: Select what curve you would like to encrypt on for ECC asymmetric encryption.
